title: OCC Chief: Banks Blocking Crypto Custody Is 'Recipe for Irrelevance'
contentSnippet: Comptroller of the Currency Jonathan Gould warned that restricting national trust banks from digital assets would stifle innovation.

title: No Direction: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Dec. 9, 2025

title: Bitcoin's ‘bear flag pattern’ targets $67K as BTC spot demand slumps
contentSnippet: The absence of new buyers and weakening ETF demand are factors likely to keep the Bitcoin price pinned below $93,000 as a bear flag targets $67,000.

title: VeChain Unveils New 'Hayabusa' Consensus and Tokenomics Upgrade
contentSnippet: With more than 5.5 million app users in the last year, VeChain is focusing on tangible use cases for crypto that “you can hold in your hands.”

title: Tassat Wins U.S. Patent for 'Yield-in-Transit' Onchain Settlement Tech
contentSnippet: The IP covers intraday, block-by-block interest accrual during 24/7 settlement and underpins Lynq, an institutional network Tassat co-launched in July.

title: ‘Elite’ traders hunt dopamine-seeking retail on prediction markets: 10x Research
contentSnippet: Rising retail participation incentivizes data-driven, “elite” traders to use “information asymmetry” and spreads caused by casual investors seeking a quick buck, 10x said.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Bitcoin Slips Back Toward Danger Zone Ahead of Fed Decision
contentSnippet: Bitcoin surrendered gains from earlier in the week, fell back toward $90,000 as traders braced for Wednesday’s Federal Reserve rate decision.

title: Polygon deploys Madhugiri hard fork, aims for 33% throughput boost
contentSnippet: Polygon’s hard fork cuts consensus time to one second, supports Fusaka EIPs and lays the groundwork for stablecoin and RWA-focused scaling.

title: Plume Secures ADGM Commercial License, Eyes Middle East RWA Expansion
contentSnippet: Plume Network has received a commercial license from the Abu Dhabi Global Market, allowing expansion into the Middle East.

title: HashKey Seeks $215 Million in Hong Kong IPO While Racing Against Its Cash Burn Rate
contentSnippet: HashKey's prospectus highlights surging institutional volume, expanding staking and tokenization pipelines and more than 1.44 million users, while losses and a US$5.2 million monthly burn rate loom ov

title: HashKey crypto exchange opens Hong Kong IPO subscription, targets $215M
contentSnippet: HashKey opens IPO subscriptions as it seeks to raise $214.7 million, valuing Hong Kong’s biggest crypto exchange at about $2.5 billion.

title: ASIC Expands Digital Asset Relief For Stablecoin Intermediaries
contentSnippet: The Australian regulator indicated the framework could expand as additional stablecoin and wrapped token issuers secure AFS licences.

title: Will Zcash's ZEC return to $500 or higher before 2026?
contentSnippet: Bullish reversal signals and rising whale demand increase ZEC’s chances of hitting $500 in December, though some caution remains warranted.

title: SGX's Crypto Futures Draw New Liquidity, Not Diverted Cash, Exchange's President Says
contentSnippet: Institutions are pursuing cash-and-carry arbitrage, not outright bullish plays, Syn said.

title: Saylor Says Strategy Will Not Issue Preferred Equity in Japan, Giving Metaplanet a 12 Month Head Start
contentSnippet: MSTR executive chairman shuts down idea of near term expansion of perpetual preferreds in Japan.

title: Circle gets Abu Dhabi greenlight amid UAE stablecoin and crypto push
contentSnippet: Circle has secured a license in Abu Dhabi, enabling it to operate as a licensed Money Services Provider as the UAE accelerates its rollout of crypto regulations.

title: NFT winter deepens: Monthly sales hit lowest point of the year
contentSnippet: NFT sales fell to $320 million in November — their lowest this year — with early December off to a weak start as top collections slide across the board.

title: Bitcoin retail inflows to Binance ‘collapse’ to 400 BTC record low in 2025
contentSnippet: Bitcoin retail investors have been sending fewer BTC to Binance per day than at any time in history, despite the new highs of the 2025 bull market.

title: Crypto index funds ‘a big deal’ as market complexity grows: Bitwise CIO
contentSnippet: Wide crypto-tracking funds will become more popular as investors will seek exposure as the market becomes more complex, says Bitwise’s Matt Hougan.

title: Circle Wins ADGM License, Taps Former Visa Executive to Lead Middle East Push
contentSnippet: The approval positions Circle to offer regulated payment services in Abu Dhabi as the UAE accelerates its oversight of crypto.

title: Zcash Floats Dynamic Fee Plan to Ensure Users Won’t Be Priced Out
contentSnippet: ZEC zoomed 12% amid the fee discussion, beating gains across all major tokens.

title: Ninth Defendant Pleads Guilty in $263M Crypto Social-Engineering Scheme
contentSnippet: Evan Tangeman acknowledged helping launder at least $3.5 million for the SE Enterprise group, along with turning stolen crypto into bulk cash.

title: USDC Issuer Circle Secures Abu Dhabi's ADGM License in Middle East Expansion
contentSnippet: The license allows Circle to expand USDC payment and settlement tools across the United Arab Emirates.

title: 400K Bitcoin have peeled off exchanges since last year: Santiment
contentSnippet: Some of the Bitcoin outflows from exchanges are going to individual users’ storage wallets, but ETFs and institutions are accumulating coins too.

title: Bitcoin Slips Toward ETF Break-Even Level as Inflows Slow, but Support May Be Building
contentSnippet: Bitcoin is drifting back toward the price where ETF buyers break even, as inflows slow and investors look to the Fed’s decision this week.

title: ETH, ADA, SOL Steady as Time Zone Data Shows Europe Drove Deepest Bitcoin Sell-Off Since 2018
contentSnippet: The broader market held its recent rebound, though liquidity remained thin ahead of Wednesday’s Federal Reserve decision.

title: ChatGPT Helps Expose a $1 Million Crypto 'Pig-Butchering' Scam
contentSnippet: An online romance led a Bay Area woman to drain her retirement accounts, only for an AI assistant to later warn her it was a scam.

title: HashKey Files for Hong Kong IPO, Aims to Be City’s First Listed Crypto Exchange
contentSnippet: Hashkey's filing shows its push to anchor institutional crypto infrastructure in Hong Kong as the city bolsters its digital assets oversight.

title: Tether Invests in Italian Robotics Startup Generative Bionics Amid Humanoid Hype
contentSnippet: Stablecoin issuer Tether has joined an $81 million round as humanoid robotics draws increasing investor interest.

title: CFTC to Pilot Tokenized Collateral in Derivatives Markets Starting With Bitcoin, Ethereum and USDC
contentSnippet: The CFTC has introduced a pilot allowing Bitcoin, Ethereum, and USDC to be used as margin, while updating rules to support tokenized assets.

title: [Vol.2]チームALISに聞く、トークンエコノミーの未来・日本ICO業界について
contentSnippet: 安氏と水澤氏にALISチームが考えるトークンエコノミーの未来について聞きました。またICOを行った日本からの先駆者としてICOについて詳しくインタビューさせていただきました。日本でのICOで成功させるためにはどうすべきか、今後ICOを控える企業にも必見です。
